name: Captain Neat-o in Treasure Maze
description:
Captain Neat-o in Treasure Maze

Help Captain Neat-o run around a maze collecting treasures while avoiding the guardian snakes! Can you survive and make it to the exit?

This short game takes about three minutes to complete. Made in PICO-8 for Toy Box Jam 3 using the provided graphics, sounds, and music assets.

Controls

Arrow keys to move
Z/X to start

Source code

Longplay video
